titleStmt.title: Aretina; or, The serious romance Written originally in English. Part first.
titleStmt.author: Mackenzie, George, Sir, 1636-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Broun, [Evan Tyler?] at the sign of the Sun, on the north-side of the street,

notesStmt.note: Evan Tyler's name in imprint suggested by Wing.

Augustan Reprint Society: "An Apologie for Romances" only.
